name: Super Grower (itch)
description:
ESC back to level select

Beat 40 levels by being agile, eat yellow dots and grow bigger. If enemies are smaller than you, they turn green and you are able to eat them. Remove all enemies from the battle arena to win the level. Game gets gradually more hectic and thus harder.

Super Grower is a fun game of agility and reflexes. In this game, you must control a white square and grow the square to an immense size to eliminate all other objects on the level. By moving the square around the playing area and eat the smaller yellow tokens your square will grow big.
